lead_paragraph: The Minnesota Wild signed right wing Marian Gaborik to a three-year contract yesterday, hours before he was expected to file for salary arbitration. The Wild's management and Gaborik's agent had said they expected him to file for arbitration by yesterday's deadline. Financial terms were not released.
